function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing due to crowded sidewalks and streets","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and difficulty in implementing social distancing measures","Mitigation":"Widening sidewalks, creating pedestrian-only zones, and implementing new street designs to accommodate social distancing","Technologies":"Smart city planning software, pedestrian flow analysis tools, and urban design simulations","People":"Pedestrians, cyclists, street vendors, and city residents","Owner":"City planners, urban designers, and local government"},{"Description":"Inadequate queuing space outside shops and public facilities","Impact":"Difficulty in maintaining social distancing while queuing, leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Adding more space for queuing, marking queuing areas, and creating designated queuing zones","Technologies":"Queue management systems, virtual queuing apps, and crowd control technologies","People":"Shoppers, service users, and public facility visitors","Owner":"Shop owners, service providers, and city government"},{"Description":"Inefficient traffic flow and access control in urban areas","Impact":"Risk of non-residents traversing neighborhoods, increasing the potential for disease spread and making social distancing enforcement difficult","Mitigation":"Implementing street calming projects, pedestrianization, and reconfiguring vehicular traffic flow with tactical urbanism","Technologies":"Traffic management systems, access control technologies, and urban flow modeling tools","People":"Neighborhood residents and city inhabitants","Owner":"Local government and urban planners"}]}
